author: Rafael Baptista
text:
Hi Everyone, 
I am working on a project for a small town (population 1354) related to their fleet inventory. They currently do not have a system in place that allows them to track what repairs and auto parts are performed/used on different vehicles preventing them from knowing the life-cycle costs of their fleet. 
What systems do other small communities have in place to track repairs and parts done/used on specific vehicles?
Thank you
title: Small Community Fleet Inventory Tracking System
